title: Financial Behemoths With $27 Trillion in Assets Under Management Moving on Crypto, Says CoinShares’ CSO
description: Major financial powerhouses that collectively manage an astounding $27 trillion in assets are making inroads into the world of Bitcoin and cryptocurrency after a race to list the first spot Bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF) in the United States kicked off. As noted by CoinShares Chief Strategy Officer, Meltem Demirors, at least eight financial behemoths, which […]

title: FTX Co-Founder SBF and Inner Circle Accused of Lavish Spending and Fraud in Latest Bankruptcy Report
description: On Monday, FTX released a second investigative report accusing co-founder Sam Bankman-Fried and senior executives of commingling customer deposits and corporate funds and misusing them. The report alleges that they spent $243 million on luxury residential real estate for senior staff and family members, as well as on commercial properties. FTX Execs Accused of $243 […]

title: US Will Pay $660,000,000,000 in Interest on National Debt This Year, Says Fiscal Sustainability Nonprofit
description:
A foundation created by billionaire Peter G. Peterson says rising interest rates will push the US government’s interest payments to over half a trillion dollars this year. According to a recent Peterson Foundation report, the US government will make $6.4 trillion in total payments this year, $81 billion higher than the federal outlays recorded last […]

The post US Will Pay $660,000,000,000 in Interest on National Debt This Year, Says Fiscal Sustainability Nonprofit appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
